description:
Bubble to display content in an inline context,
e.g. the structure preview table

props.name: back
props.description: Sets a custom background color. Either shorthand for Panel default colors or actual CSS value.

props.name: color
props.description: Sets a custom color. Either shorthand for Panel default colors or actual CSS value.

props.name: html
props.description:
If set to `true`, the `text` is rendered as HTML code,
otherwise as plain text

props.name: image
props.description: Optional image to display in the bubble. Used for <k-image-frame>, see for available props

props.name: link
props.description: Sets a link on the bubble. Link can be absolute or relative.

props.name: text
props.description: Text to display in the bubble
